articles.title: Amazon takeover of iRobot faces UK watchdog probe - BBC
articles.description: A review has begun into the tech giant's planned takeover of the makers of Roomba vacuum cleaners.
articles.content:
Amazon's planned takeover of Roomba vacuum cleaner maker iRobot is being reviewed by the UK's competition watchdog. 
The Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) is looking at whether the deal could … [+1113 chars]

articles.title: BlackRock to manage $114bn of asset disposals after US bank failures - Financial Times
articles.description: Regulators hire financial powerhouse to help sell securities inherited from SVB and Signature
articles.content: US regulators have appointed BlackRocks advisory arm to help sell a $114bn portfolio of securities inherited after the government takeovers of failed lenders Silicon Valley Bank and Signature Bank in… [+2593 chars]
